about_the_game:
Support the developers and help make Banana Drama even more awesome.

This DLC contains only small content. It is intended as a donation to support the Banana Drama team in the development process. We want Banana Drama to remain free forever, but we need some support. There is no disadvantage in not having these DLCs. You just look a lot cooler with them and you are significantly involved in the continuation of this game ;)

This Silver DLC contains:
1) Banana Drama monkey slippers (Bronze DLC).
2) Banana Drama monkey pants.
2) A dressing room for your monkeys.
3) Some silver design elements in the main menu.

legal_notice: All rights reserved. artifact design GbR 2022.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 20.04.4 & Fedora (might work on other versions, too)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Some imagination at least

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Some imagination at least

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Some imagination at least
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
